CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES (BusiessAreaForPlanning__c , "ZK" ), "Cold Heading; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (BusiessAreaForPlanning__c , "ZF" ), "Spring Steel; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (BusiessAreaForPlanning__c , "ZS" ), "Free Cutting Steel (SZO); ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (BusiessAreaForPlanning__c , "ZW" ), "Bearing Steel; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (BusiessAreaForPlanning__c , "ZM" ), "Forging Steel; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (BusiessAreaForPlanning__c , "ZZ - Welding Wire (SZW)" ), "Drawing Grades; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (BusiessAreaForPlanning__c , "ZZ - Tyre Cord" ), "Drawing Grades",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (BusiessAreaForPlanning__c , "ZZ - Low Carbon" ), "Drawing Grades; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (BusiessAreaForPlanning__c , "ZZ - Low Carbon - B10" ), "Drawing Grades; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES (BusiessAreaForPlanning__c , "ZZ - High Carbon" ), "Drawing Grades; ",null )
CustomField.label: AccountBA
